title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Aerosoft DHC 6 Twin Otter - manually planning your flight
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we can configure our flight plan manually in our navigation system from our Aerosoft DHC-6 Twin Otter. 

The Route being configure will be from March ARB (KRIV) to a Zamperini FLD (KTOA) But to show the full potential of the Garmin navigation system we will modify our flight by adding a departure approach and changing active legs etc.
